name: Pounse
tag_list: social-networking, online-dating, social-dating, consumer-internet, consumer-web, matchmaking, event-planning
overview:
Pounse is the invitation-only site that introduces members to new people through their friends. Pounse is free, and designed for people both single and in a relationship.

Just as most successful relationships begin with friend introductions, Pounse introduces members through common friends. Want to get introduced? Ask a shared friend to set you up. Know two friends who would be good together? Use Pounseâ€™s matchmaking features to make the introduction.

Pounseâ€™s member-only events give users a chance to meet up offline in a casual setting with friends, preventing blind dates. Privacy filters put an end to unwanted communication, while friend lists prove members are who they say they are.

Pounse uses Facebook Connect to make getting started quick and easy. And because Pounse is invite-only, itâ€™s a trusted network of friends - just like a backyard BBQ.

Meet people through your friends and you already have something in common. Pounse - itâ€™s who you knowâ€¦
